TEXT.English: Fools! You have not seen the last of Iridius, Terror of the West!
TEXT.French: Fools! You have not seen the last of Iridius, Terror of the West!
TEXT.German: Fools! You have not seen the last of Iridius, Terror of the West!
TEXT.Italian: Fools! You have not seen the last of Iridius, Terror of the West!
TEXT.Spanish: Fools! You have not seen the last of Iridius, Terror of the West!

TEXT.English: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Your units begin with the Blessed promotion, which gives them extra strength, but is lost after their first combat.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Your Priests of Agruonn can cast Bless.
TEXT.French: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Vos unités commencent bénies : elles reçoivent 1 point de force supplémentaire, mais ce bonus est perdu après leur premier combat.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Vos Prêtres d'Agruonn peuvent bénir vos unités.
TEXT.German: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Ihre Einheiten beginnen gesegnet: sie bekommen zusätzliche Stärke, aber die Beförderung ist nach ihren ersten Kampf verloren.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Ihre Priester des Agruonns können Einheiten segnen.
TEXT.Italian: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Your units begin with the Blessed promotion, which gives them extra strength, but is lost after their first combat.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Your Priests of Agruonn can cast Bless.
TEXT.Spanish: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Your units begin with the Blessed promotion, which gives them extra strength, but is lost after their first combat.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Your Priests of Agruonn can cast Bless.

TEXT.English: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]When you cast the Worldbreak world spell, the effects of Warcry are added to it and vice versa. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Your world spell is reset every 360 turns (in normal speed).
TEXT.French: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]When you cast the Worldbreak world spell, the effects of Warcry are added to it and vice versa. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Your world spell is reset every 360 turns (in normal speed).
TEXT.German: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]When you cast the Worldbreak world spell, the effects of Warcry are added to it and vice versa. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Your world spell is reset every 360 turns (in normal speed).
TEXT.Italian: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]When you cast the Worldbreak world spell, the effects of Warcry are added to it and vice versa. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Your world spell is reset every 360 turns (in normal speed).
TEXT.Spanish: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]When you cast the Worldbreak world spell, the effects of Warcry are added to it and vice versa. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Your world spell is reset every 360 turns (in normal speed).

TEXT.English: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Your archery units can learn Marksman once they reach Level 3.
TEXT.French: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Your archery units can learn Marksman once they reach Level 3.
TEXT.German: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Your archery units can learn Marksman once they reach Level 3.
TEXT.Italian: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Your archery units can learn Marksman once they reach Level 3.
TEXT.Spanish: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Your archery units can learn Marksman once they reach Level 3.

TEXT.English: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Your World Spell is reset every 120 turns.
TEXT.French: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Your World Spell is reset every 120 turns.
TEXT.German: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Your World Spell is reset every 120 turns.
TEXT.Italian: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Your World Spell is reset every 120 turns.
TEXT.Spanish: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Your World Spell is reset every 120 turns.

TEXT.English: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Your Archers begin with extra ranged strength and damage limit. Furthermore, they can acquire a promotion which increases their visibility and range once they reach Level 4.
TEXT.French: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Vos unités d'archers ont plus de limite de dégâts et de force en attaque à distance. De plus, elles peuvent acquérir une promotion leur donnant plus de portée et de visibilité à partir du niveau 4.
TEXT.German: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Ihre Bogeneinheiten haben erhöhte Kampfreichweite und Schaden für Fernkampfwaffen. Ab Niveau 4 können sie erhöhte Reichweite und Sichtweite bekommen.
TEXT.Italian: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Your Archers begin with extra ranged strength and damage limit. Furthermore, they can acquire a promotion which increases their visibility and range once they reach Level 4.
TEXT.Spanish: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Your Archers begin with extra ranged strength and damage limit. Furthermore, they can acquire a promotion which increases their visibility and range once they reach Level 4.

TEXT.English: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Your Melee units are robots: they get a strength bonus, but cannot gain experience through combat.
TEXT.French: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Your Melee units are robots: they get a strength bonus, but cannot gain experience through combat.
TEXT.German: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Your Melee units are robots: they get a strength bonus, but cannot gain experience through combat.
TEXT.Italian: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Your Melee units are robots: they get a strength bonus, but cannot gain experience through combat.
TEXT.Spanish: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Your Melee units are robots: they get a strength bonus, but cannot gain experience through combat.

TEXT.English: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Your World Spell summons Treants in each of your forests, like the Ljosalfar World Spell, and gives them Hidden Nationality. However, it requires the Way of the Forests technology.
TEXT.French: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Your World Spell summons Treants in each of your forests, like the Ljosalfar World Spell, and gives them Hidden Nationality. However, it requires the Way of the Forests technology.
TEXT.German: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Your World Spell summons Treants in each of your forests, like the Ljosalfar World Spell, and gives them Hidden Nationality. However, it requires the Way of the Forests technology.
TEXT.Italian: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Your World Spell summons Treants in each of your forests, like the Ljosalfar World Spell, and gives them Hidden Nationality. However, it requires the Way of the Forests technology.
TEXT.Spanish: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Your World Spell summons Treants in each of your forests, like the Ljosalfar World Spell, and gives them Hidden Nationality. However, it requires the Way of the Forests technology.

TEXT.English: The wheels of fate are turning...
TEXT.French: The wheels of fate are turning...
TEXT.German: The wheels of fate are turning...
TEXT.Italian: The wheels of fate are turning...
TEXT.Spanish: The wheels of fate are turning...

TEXT.English: Worldspell will be reset next turn.
TEXT.French: Worldspell will be reset next turn.
TEXT.German: Worldspell will be reset next turn.
TEXT.Italian: Worldspell will be reset next turn.
TEXT.Spanish: Worldspell will be reset next turn.
